Rulings.Tengu:
●If this monster is attacked while face-down, and is destroyed as a result of battle, its effect does not activate. (Unlike “Kiseitai” because “Kiseitai” has an effect preventing damage calculation.)
●The effect of “Brain Jacker” that increases Life Points can be chained to.
Rulings.Goat:
●If this monster is attacked while face-down, and is destroyed by battle, its effect does not activate. (Unlike “Kiseitai” because “Kiseitai” has an effect preventing damage calculation.)
●The effect of “Brain Jacker” that increases LP can be chained to.
